mapper.select: SELECT app.id AS applicationId, s.name AS studentName, s.username AS studentUsername, s.phone AS studentPhone, slot.start_time AS scheduledTime, slot.location, app.status, app.is_urgent AS isUrgent FROM initial_visit_applications app JOIN users s ON app.student_id = s.id LEFT JOIN schedule_slots slot ON app.schedule_slot_id = slot.id WHERE app.id = #{applicationId} AND app.assigned_interviewer_id = #{interviewerId} AND app.is_deleted = 0
